sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2013/L.19), the SBSTA: - takes note of the views of parties; - initiates the process of the development of the guidelines and agrees to continue this process at SBSTA 39 based on elements of the general guidelines contained in the annex to the SBSTA conclusions, without prejudging where these elements should be placed, in the draft decision or the draft guidelines; and - reiterates that it will forward draft guidelines to COP 19.
